job_title: College Student Aide in New York, NY
cons: None, it pretty great place to work at.

review_title: Good pay, kind and welcoming culture - difficult responsibilities.
job_title: Academic Tutor in New York, NY
pros: People are kind and warm. Food at events. Meaningful work with some students. Schedule is fair. Pay is good compared to similar positions.
cons: Sometimes tutors are expected to be able to help students pass classes when they do not have the basic skill set with which to approach the material.

job_title: IT ASSISTANT in New York, NY
pros: Outgoing Team Members and easy tasks
cons: not many staff members for the workload

pros:
1. Dedicated faculty and advisors
2. Great location
3. HR and IT support are strong
cons:
1. Poor working conditions
2. Chaotic administration
3. The college lurches from crisis to crisis (before Covid as well). There's never a period of normalcy or calmness
4. It is not clear whether the university and the administration are interested in the continued functioning of the institution
5. High atrition rate

job_title: Research Assistant in New York, NY
pros: They really try to hear everyones voice to keep GCC on track to succeed. Pay was always timely. Culture was nice there.
cons: Some people seem to be confused of the mission of GCC... needs to clear that up with students and employees.

job_title: Academic Success Studio Peer Mentor in New York, NY
pros: Wonderful grads who help facilitate the lessons, helping students find their path while achieving personal and academic goals is very rewarding.
cons: sometimes lack of communication, dishonesty, confusion among peers about being told different stories to the point we don't know what is true and what isn't.

review_title: Experiences teaching at a NY Community College

job_title: Student Aide in New York, NY
pros: Work revolved around my hours, projects were quick based, allowed to work from home, and management was reasonable and fair
cons: Personally, I have no cons to point out. It was pleasant but not exciting. Standard office work.

job_title: College Assistant in New York, NY
pros: Nice job, easy, helps with tuition, good insurance coverage
cons: Some people are not so great, fake people, don't pay attention to part time workers.

job_title: Marketing Strategist in East Elmhurst, NY
pros: Being able to work side by side with academic advisors.
cons: Despite all work being done on a computer, there is no flexibility to work from home.

job_title: Adjunct Lecturer in New York, NY
pros: Students who want to succeed, faculty who are focused on students rather than politics.
cons: Subjugate to overarching CUNY policy and government budget cuts.
